content: upd 2020 09 13 i m glad to announce that mosaic crochet pattern is available for download the description includes written instructions and diagrams each square is crocheted in the round from the center and outward technic double filet crochet interlocking filet crochet type blanket / afghan gauge 5 windows by 5 windows in 5 cm as long as your windows are square using a different gauge won t affect the design but it will change the finish size and the amount of yarn needed hook size 4 5 mm hook size needed to match the gauge approximate yardage 4000 meters of yarn for each of your two colors which is a total of 8000 meters of yarn 4375 yards per colors a total of 8750 yards of yarn 18-19 skeins 3 5 oz for each colors size 150 cm wide and 210 cm long 150 x 210 windows the pattern contains a graph and right-handed instructions description is for 2x2 squares according to the description you can also crochet each square separately from another a blanket measuring is 5x7 squares
